text: [[col:dark_r]]This rite will unlock after arranging at least 7 Trade Agreements.[[/col]]
[[col:dark_r]]This rite will unlock after accumulating a total income of 3000 gold.[[/col]]
[[col:dark_r]]This rite will unlock after owning at least 2 Coastal Settlements.[[/col]]
[[col:dark_r]]This rite will unlock after reaching rank 8 with your Faction Leader.[[/col]]
